about.title: About Cihat Kaya
about.subtitle: Your Dedicated Real Estate Professional
about.description: With years of experience in the Den Haag real estate market, Cihat Kaya brings unparalleled expertise and dedication to every client relationship. As a certified real estate agent, Cihat specializes in residential properties throughout Den Haag and surrounding areas.

contact.title: Contact Glodinas Makelaardij
contact.subtitle: Ready to find your dream property or sell your current one? Get in touch with our expert team. We're here to guide you through every step of your real estate journey.
contact.serving: Serving all of Den Haag area
contact.serviceAreaDesc: We proudly serve Den Haag and the surrounding municipalities, providing expert real estate services throughout the region. Our local knowledge and market expertise ensure you get the best possible service for your property needs.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the services of Glodinas Makelaardij, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.servicesText: Glodinas Makelaardij provides real estate brokerage services including but not limited to property buying, selling, valuation, and consultation services in Den Haag and surrounding areas.
terms.obligationsText: Clients are required to provide accurate and complete information regarding their real estate needs and financial capabilities. Any misrepresentation may result in termination of services.
terms.feesText: Our commission structure and fees will be clearly outlined in the signed agreement. All fees are subject to Dutch tax regulations and must be paid according to the agreed terms.
terms.liabilityText: Glodinas Makelaardij shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
terms.terminationText: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice. Upon termination, all obligations cease except for those that by their nature should survive termination.
terms.governingText: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

privacy.title: Privacy Statement
privacy.introText: Glodinas Makelaardij respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy statement explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you contact us, schedule appointments, or use our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and property preferences.
privacy.useText: We use your information to provide real estate services, communicate with you about properties, schedule appointments, and improve our services. We may also use your information for marketing purposes with your consent.
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this privacy statement or as required by law.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.retentionText: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy statement, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
privacy.rightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also object to certain processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy statement or our data practices, please contact us using the information provided on our contact page.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy statement from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy statement on this page and updating the last updated date.
